On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Masked Singer S3 ep 7 Part 1
programme.desc: New Season, new masked singers, exciting twists and triple the fun on the third season of Masked Singer Pilipinas.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 6
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 7
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas.

programme.title: The Kasambahays S2 ep 19
programme.desc: Guia (Donnalyn Bartolome) transfers to a different neighborhood, meets new faces. New kasambahays, new masters and a whole new adventure packed with fun and laughter.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 1
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 9
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: The Kasambahays S2 ep 19
programme.desc: Guia (Donnalyn Bartolome) transfers to a different neighborhood, meets new faces. New kasambahays, new masters and a whole new adventure packed with fun and laughter.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kakampi Ko ang Diyos
programme.desc: Using a religious stature to defend himself, an ex-soldier and intelligence agent gets trapped in a conspiracy involving government and rebel forces.

programme.title: Encounter ep 20
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 12
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 3
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: GMA Pinoy Blockbuster: 'El Presidente'
programme.desc: The life story of the first Philippine President. The story of the man who led the Filipino people to victory against its Spanish conquerors.

programme.title: Miss Na Miss Kita (Ang Utol Kong Hoodlum 2)
programme.desc: Together, Robin and Vina, created beautiful music. Together they were in constant danger because of certain people and certain events, which were taking place around them, but they were not aware of.

programme.title: Astig
programme.desc: Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs made their living by putting one over small time con-artists. They became very good at what they were doing so that they were soon recruited into the big-time.

programme.title: Kapantay ay Langit
programme.desc: Little Charina Scott played Cupid in this romantic comedy about a single mother finding another chance at love.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The box-office idols of the 60's played parents to a young crop of talented comedians in this tale about two families. The fun began when the boys decided to try out each other's lifestyles which means getting into trouble for Niño, and books and computers for Herbert.

programme.title: Demolisyon
programme.desc: This film presents the struggles of people to have a home of their own and the pain and the anguish they face when they are forced out of their homes and the shanties they thought they owned are demolished.

programme.title: Wala Na Bang Pag-ibig?
programme.desc: For years, they have been the best of friends. Gemma is bratty Eric’s buddy, and to some extent, accomplice in his not too few escapades. But what if one day, all of a sudden, Gemma feels something different for Eric?

programme.title: Bad Boys Gang
programme.desc: Daang Buenaventura, head of the bad boys gang (and an avid follower of Robin Padilla, hence the similar ways and manner of his everyday lifestyle) prefers living in jail rather than enjoying the free life at the young age of 17.

programme.title: Vizconde Massacre 2
programme.desc: Carlo J. Caparas, master of the massacre film took another look at the Vizconde rape and murder case with this film.

programme.title: Working Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A humorous, but truly insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a living in the big city and coping with all the prejudice life bestowed on them because of their sex. This is also about their loves, their dreams, their weaknesses.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: Row 4, The Baliktorians
programme.desc: Aruy (Dennis Padilla) and Aguy (Andrew E), heirs to a 10 million fortune, on a condition that they'll able to graduate. If not, the money would go to the school with so much at stake.

programme.title: Uubusin Ko Ang Lahi Mo
programme.desc: The canonigos led by Mayor Placido (Eddie Gutierrez) have enjoyed sole political control of the town for sometime now. But their abusive reign is threatened when Fortunato Guerrero (Robert Arevalo) plans to enter the political arena in the coming elections. The Guerrero and Canonigo clans both vow to eliminate the each other.

programme.title: Love at First Sight
programme.desc: Three childhood friends discover their worth and inner strengths, as they experience love and being loved.

programme.title: Friends in Love (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Set in the sprawling campus of Brent School in scenic Baguio City, young stars Sharon, William, Jackie Lou and Rowell played a game of romantic musical chairs in this heartwarming story. Opposites attract and they were all faced with the difficulty of adjusting to the differences in their personalities.

programme.title: Masamang Damo
programme.desc: When Joko Diaz placed his family in danger after getting into an imbroglio with fellow slumboys, he wisely contrived a plan.

programme.title: Tag-Araw, Tag-Ulan
programme.desc: A woman who was running away from the pain of a broken love affair. A young man who was looking forward to a fun-filled summer and his first sex experience.

programme.title: Sa Hirap at Ginhawa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: In the story, a young couple eloped, got married and then must cope with problems like money, living on their own, trying to finish school and raising a baby.

programme.title: Sa Isang Sulok Ng Mga Pangarap
programme.desc: Alice Dixson turned in two powerful performances as the young woman forced into plastic surgery and as the wife she was made to resemble who got hold of her husband's (Ariel Rivera) money and then ran off with her lover.

programme.title: Starlet
programme.desc: The story tells of an obedient daughter who,out of necessity,must do something to save the life of her ailing mother.

programme.title: Totoy Golem
programme.desc: Way back in the late 50's one of the most feared names on the streets of Manila was that of Totoy Golem of the then, notorious district of Tondo.

programme.title: Pik Pak Boom
programme.desc: Two stories in one entertaining film about young people learning that happiness comes from learning how to give of one's self.

programme.title: Alyas Pogi 2
programme.desc: All patrolman Henry Cruz \"Alyas Pogi\" wants is to live a simple life with his son. But his former enemies would not allow it.

programme.title: Lucas Abelardo
programme.desc: His sincerity and great dedication to his work is what distinguished police officer Lucas Abelardo from his other colleagues. But keeping to his principles while doing his job is not easy.

programme.title: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Dina played a Filipina working with a US-based chemical company. Eddie played the Chief of Police assigned to protect the chemical company visiting group which fell victim to a terrorist gang. Eddie was only too obsessed to save the company because Dina happened to be his girlfriend.

programme.title: Rocky N Rolly
programme.desc: The swindling trio of Rolly, Alex and Cleto earn big bucks by using different disguises to fool people. They soon join forces with ex-boxer, Rocky, who quit the sport after syndicate hench men beat him up for refusing him to join the game.
